text: Eteke sihamte yadi tomara lagata bitarkata lipta haya tente tumi koraa, ‘ma'i allahara ocarata atmasamarpana karaicho arau mora anusaraisakale'o’. Arau yisakalaka kitaba diya haiche sihamtaka arau niraksarasakalaka koraa, ‘tomaloke'o atmasamarpana karaicha neki?’ Yadi sihamte atmasamarpana karae tente niscaya sihamte'o hidayata paba; arau yadi sihamte mukha ghuraa'i laya tente tomara kartabya kerala pracara karaa; arau allaha bandasakalara bisaye samyaka drasta
